events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request for money back after receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for handling the refund inquiry efficiently.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support, and I understand you would like a refund for your recent order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture showing the incorrect item I received instead of the product I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount reflected back in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and resolution. It’s reassuring to know my refund is being processed so promptly.
The refund has been processed successfully, and I have sent you a confirmation email with the transaction details. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution of your issue.
Since the refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting our support.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on your experience with our support team.
